General.Name: Amulaire Thermal Technology
General.Description: Amulaire Thermal Technology, Inc. provides cooling fins for green electronic devices in Taiwan, Europe, North America, and Japan. The company offers customized products; metal injection moldings, lower flow resistance, and lighter weight designs. It also provides forgings for aluminum alloys; and thermal modules and inverter parts, and heat dissipation systems and high power electronic system parts. In addition, the company provides brazing for structure design, as well as offers friction stir welding technology to soften and blend the materials. Further, it provides various simulation analysis technology. Amulaire Thermal Technology, Inc. was founded in 2011 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: Wenhua 3rd Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24452
